{"id":1070603317,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 4 weeks","timestamp":1696823053,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"19 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1070603317/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Median of Two Sorted Arrays","memory":"90 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    double findMedianSortedArrays(vector<int>& nums1, vector<int>& nums2) {\n        if(nums1.size() == 0 && nums2.size() == 0){\n            return 0;\n        }\n\n        nums1.insert(nums1.end(), nums2.begin(), nums2.end());\n        std:sort(nums1.begin(), nums1.end());\n\n        float res;\n        int mid=nums1.size()/2;\n        \n        if(nums1.size() % 2 == 0){\n            float med = nums1[mid] + nums1[mid-1];\n            res = med / 2;\n        }\n        else\n        {\n            res = nums1[mid];\n        }\n        return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"median-of-two-sorted-arrays","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
